amendment.description: To increase the amounts provided for national defense for fiscal year 2005 for new budget activity and for outlays.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2742 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 4. Record Vote Number: 37.

action.text: Amendment SA 2742 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S2506-2510, S2517-2518; text: CR S2506-2507) To increase the amounts provided for national defense for fiscal year 2005 for new budget activity and for outlays.
